text: Il Canzoniere is a collection of 365 poems. It was written by the Italian poet Petrarch between 1336 and 1373. Its central theme is the poet's love for Laura, a woman Petrarch allegedly met on April 6, 1327, in the Church of Sainte Claire in Avignon == Other websites == *Il Canzoniere online *Il Canzoniere text * Canzoniere (different edition) and other works * Petrarch and Laura Multi-lingual site Category:14th-century books Category:Poetry books Category:Italian literature
title: Il Canzoniere
